ygData.subject: Re: Guild News
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been trying the past 2 weeks to get a chapter of Mystic Alliance set up on Innoruuk. I m told that only one GM (one that works for Verant) on the whole
ygData.messageBody:
I've been trying the past 2 weeks to get a chapter of "Mystic Alliance" set up
on Innoruuk. I'm told that only one GM (one that works for Verant) on the
whole server can do it for me (yet tons of GMs who can't help my petition,
Need to be set up as GM of Mystic Alliance guild, respond and then tell me
they can't do a thing for me, go figure). I'm told he's only on weeknights EST
which is when I usually play anyway, I've actually seen him on twice, but not
for long, though I'm sure he goes invisible often.

Anyway, I'm still trying to get the guild set up on Innoruuk. Last I know I
was the only one who voluntered for the position (and probably even plays on
that server! heh). But if you happen to stop on look me up.

JSpectre
Dark Elf Necromancer, level 18.
